bibl.title: Three Greek Christian Epitaphs from Lower Nubia in the Collection of the Archaeological Museum in Cracow.
bibl.note: Inv. MAK/AS/1631-1633. Édition de 3 inscriptions funéraires transcrites par: C.M. FIRTH, The Archaeological Survey of Nubia. Report for 1908-1909. I (Cairo, 1912) p. 45, tombes 95 et 122; p. 47, tombe 302. Ginari, IXe-Xe siècles.
bibl.seg: LAJTAR Adam, Three Greek Christian Epitaphs from Lower Nubia in the Collection of the Archaeological Museum in Cracow.
Materialy Archeologiczne 27 (1994) No. 2, pp. 55-61 et 3 pll.
